<S%G2532>And<s%> for <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G1223>cause<s%> he <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G3316>mediator<s%> of the <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1242>testament<s%>, <S%G3704>that<s%> by <S%G1096>means<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%>, <S%G1519>for<s%> the <S%G629>redemption<s%> of the <S%G3847>transgressions<s%> that were <S%G1909>under<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G1242>testament<s%>, they which are <S%G2564>called<s%> might <S%G2983>receive<s%> the <S%G1860>promise<s%> of <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2817>inheritance<s%>.
